entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
